thread.title: Amber Valletta Super Bowl Photo Diary
thread.title_full: Amber Valletta Super Bowl Photo Diary

title: Amber Valletta Super Bowl Photo Diary
text: Amber Valletta Shows How a Supermodel Does the Super Bowl February 6, 2017 10:22 PM 1 / 13 “So excited for Super Bowl LI!” Photo: Courtesy of Amber Valletta The Super Bowl isn’t just another game. With celebrity fans cheering on their favorite teams and some of the world’s best-dressed men right there on the field, the night offers plenty of excitement beyond keeping track of the score. No one understands this better than supermodel Amber Valletta, who headed down to Texas to see Tom Brady and the New England Patriots battle the Atlanta Falcons. Bringing a little high-fashion glamour to the proceedings in a Gucci denim jacket, Valletta enjoyed chili dogs, dancing in the aisles during Lady Gaga ’s electrifying halftime performance , and even a few romantic moments with boyfriend, Teddy Charles. Capturing every moment for Vogue , Valletta gives you a taste of what it was like to be in Houston as the Pats made history. In a game filled with drama, even longtime Pats fan Valletta couldn’t predict the showstopping outcome. “This was my second Super Bowl and I was on the edge of my seat,” says Valletta. “I can't believe they did it! Tom Brady is the best ever!” Experience the excitement for yourself in Valletta’s adorable—and emoji-filled—behind-the-scenes diary. In This Story: Super Bowl Recommended For You
